name: Cute Hijab Fashion model Girl Makeup & Spa Saloon Dress Up Game - Beautiful Hijab Girl Game
name_original: Cute Hijab Fashion model Girl Makeup & Spa Saloon Dress Up Game - Beautiful Hijab Girl Game
description:
Learn hijab dressing style by playing this Hijab makeover Games
If you love hijab girls then just come and try new look of hijab fashion.
Maria wants different dressing style.
She needs to dress up like hijab girl.
Step by step give maria a different hijab islamic look.
Give her nice spa treatment and make her relax.
Now apply some make up on her by choosing best eyeshadow,eyelashes,lipstick,mascara etc.
Help maria to choose best and designer hijab dresses.
You will find very beautiful and stunning collection of hijab dresses and cosmetics in different colours.

Features:

=> Varieties of masks, facial treatment.
=> Different colorful eye lenses, eyeshadows, lipstick, ,charming mascara.
=> Best hijab abaya dresses or gown, handbags, shoes, royal niqab.
